actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 106 of title 10, United States Code, to extend the educational assistance program for members of the Selected Reserve to additional programs of education.

summary.text: Amends Federal law concerning armed forces educational assistance to extend the educational assistance provided for members of the Selected Reserve to include various programs of education. (Currently such assistance is only available for a program of education at an institution of higher learning.)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 106 of title 10, United States Code, to extend the educational assistance program for members of the Selected Reserve to additional programs of education.
